ibis.ipl.util.messagecombining

Class StoreArrayInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • ibis.io.DataInputStream
        • ibis.ipl.util.messagecombining.StoreArrayInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ibis.io.DataInput, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class StoreArrayInputStream
extends ibis.io.DataInputStream
    Extends InputStream with read of array of primitives and readSingleInt
